title: del.icio.us and Yahoo! sitting in a tree
content:
We're proud to announce that del.icio.us has joined the Yahoo! family. Together we'll continue to improve how people discover, remember and share on the Internet, with a big emphasis on the power of community.
Source: del.icio.us: y.ah.oo!

Well, then! del.icio.us has come a long way since I abandoned my own Safari Bookmark Blogger hack to finally try this "multiplayer muxway" thing Joshua was playing around with. From the apartment servers, to the start-up offices with patio chairs, to the Yahoo! I'm guessing this will make my job a little harder on the book-writing front, but nonetheless: congratulations!
